page.title: 19BATLEY HIGH SCHOOL FOR BOYS
page.content: At Batley High School there are about 1600 pupils.There are about 85 teachers at the school.The school has a sports hall,a gymnasium,three music rooms,a tuck shop,seven science rooms, ten technical rooms,four art rooms.The school in all has about 40 other class rooms.The main hall has a stage. The school has a hut up near Settle where boys can go for weekends.The school has a number of clubs such as: Brassband,choir,fishing,travel,bird watching and athletics. The headmaster is Mr.Simpkins who has only been here about a year.The head of the lower school is Mr.Dews and the haed of the higher school is Mr.Whitehead.The School has a coach, tennis courts and many other sports facilities.In 1983 the new block was opened which made the school a lot bigger.
